subproject.description:
Output 1. Raised awareness and commitment to disability as a rights based, inclusive issued by government, civil society groups and the international community in Afghanistan.
Output : Quality programmes and relevant services are reaching more disabled people in key sectores of health, education and livelihood in geographical areas currently not reached by services
Output 3:  A governmental led new organisational body is forem which is repsonsible for the coordination, managment and leadership in disability policy and practice in the country.
Output 4: An accessible national knowledge bank created on disability
donor_long: OFFICE OF THE HIGH COMMISSIONER FOR HR
GOVERNMENT OF UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
subproject.title: National Programme for Action

title: National Programme for Action on Disability
